org.sensorhub.api.sensor

Interface ISensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>

  • Type Parameters:
    ConfigType -
    All Superinterfaces:
    IEventProducer, IModule<ConfigType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSensorModule

    public interface ISensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
extends IModule<ConfigType>, IEventProducer

    Interface to be implemented by all sensor drivers connected to the system

    Copyright (c) 2010

    Since:
    Nov 5, 2010
    Author:
    Alexandre Robin

    • Method Detail

      • isSensorDescriptionUpdateSupported

        boolean isSensorDescriptionUpdateSupported()
        Checks sensor description update capability If true, the updateSensorDescription method should be implemented
        Returns:
        true if sensor description updates is supported, false otherwise

      • isSensorDescriptionHistorySupported

        boolean isSensorDescriptionHistorySupported()
        Checks sensor description history capability If true, the getSensorDescription(DateTime t) method should be implemented
        Returns:
        true if sensor description history is supported, false otherwise

      • getCurrentSensorDescription

        net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess getCurrentSensorDescription()
                                                                     throws SensorException
        Retrieves most current sensor description
        Returns:
        SMLSytem object containing all metadata about the sensor
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • getLastSensorDescriptionUpdate

        double getLastSensorDescriptionUpdate()
        Used to check when sensor description was last updated. This is useful to avoid requesting the object when it hasn't changed.
        Returns:
        date/time of last sensor description update as julian time (1970)

      • getSensorDescription

        net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess getSensorDescription(double time)
                                                              throws SensorException
        Retrieves historic sensor description valid at time t
        Parameters:
        time - julian time (1970) at which description is valid
        Returns:
        SMLSytem object containing sensor metadata valid at time t
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • getSensorDescriptionHistory

        List<net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess> getSensorDescriptionHistory()
                                                                           throws SensorException
        Gets the whole history of sensor descriptions
        Returns:
        list of process descriptions (with disjoint time validity periods)
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • updateSensorDescription

        void updateSensorDescription(net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess systemDesc,
                           boolean recordHistory)
                             throws SensorException
        Updates and historizes system description
        Parameters:
        systemDesc - SMLSystem object with validity period
        recordHistory - if true, older versions of the descriptions will be retained and made accessible by time
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • getAllOutputs

        Map<String,? extends ISensorDataInterface> getAllOutputs()
                                                         throws SensorException
        Retrieves the list of interfaces to all sensor data outputs
        Returns:
        map of output names -> data interface objects
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • getStatusOutputs

        Map<String,? extends ISensorDataInterface> getStatusOutputs()
                                                            throws SensorException
        Retrieves the list of interface to sensor status outputs
        Returns:
        map of output names -> data interface objects
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • getObservationOutputs

        Map<String,? extends ISensorDataInterface> getObservationOutputs()
                                                                 throws SensorException
        Retrieves the list of interface to sensor observation outputs
        Returns:
        map of output names -> data interface objects
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • getCommandInputs

        Map<String,? extends ISensorControlInterface> getCommandInputs()
                                                               throws SensorException
        Retrieves the list of interface to sensor command inputs
        Returns:
        map of input names -> control interface objects
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns the sensor connection status
        Returns:
        true if sensor is actually connected and can communicate with the driver
